About this Site

This data provides a window into how people are interacting with the city government online. The data comes from a unified Google Analytics account for city agencies. This program helps government agencies understand how people find, access, and use government services online. The program does not track individuals, and anonymizes IP addresses.

Download the data

You can download the data here. Available in JSON and CSV format.
